item.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è üöß Please pardon the dust - renovations underway.
item.description: ETA ~ mid 2023. Hello! Welcome to my virtual lab! This is meant to be, first and foremost, a collection of memories for my older self. I hope this space also serves as an easy-to-share place for all things for family/friends. If you’re here on purpose, you know where to look. If you’re a recruiter, thank you for coming by. I’m probably not looking for opportunities right now. If you’re curious anyway, LinkedIn is the best place to reach me.
